page.title: 16RELIGION
page.content: {RELIGION:}A group of about 30 twelve year old children were asked about the influence of religion in their life. almost all were nominally Church of England,1 Methodist &4 not christened. Despite this only 2 went to church regularly, the remainder only going on special occasions.The maximum distance anyone lived from a church was 3 miles & only 1 person said church was significant in his/her life. {SUPERSTITIONS:}Don't open an umbrella indoors;Pick a 4 leaf clover for luck;Don't put new shoes on a table;Touch wood for luck;Don't cut toe nails on Sunday or finger nails on Friday;Don't pass somebody on stairs;Don't walk under a ladder;Don't sing carols before Christmas;If spill salt throw some over left shoulder; Break a mirror- 7 years bad luck; Wearing green is bad luck.
